questions.question: What devices are acceptable to plug into your CRCAs?

answers.a: A cell phone to listen to music
A cell phone to charge it only
A personal USB drive to copy files

questions.question: It's OK to install software on our workstations or CRCAs as long as we ask an IT person to do it

answers.r: Nope. We must follow the processes to ensure compliance.
Right. Use the APS Software Installation Menu or Get it Here�on�Inside APS to follow processes
